{{Exclusive|bedrock}}
{{Work in progress}}

A '''spawn event''', also known as a '''mob event''', is a way to spawn [[entity|entities]] under certain event conditions. They are defined under the <code>events</code> object in the entity's behavior file. Spawn events are used in commands such as {{cmd|summon}} and {{cmd|event}}.
